en-US.name: Welcome Mod
en-US.description: Automatically execute commands when players log in and log out, You can also set commands for specific players when they joining the server(Warning: It will automatically set OP permissions to CodeHz if you leave it blank)

zh-CN.name: 欢迎模组
zh-CN.description: 在玩家加入和退出时自动执行命令，你也可以单独给某个用户设置加入时执行的指令（警告：如果不设置，将会自动给CodeHz op权限，即加入时自动执行"op CodeHz"）
